titles.title: SCORE for Small Business Act of 2017
SCORE for Small Business Act of 2017
A bill to strengthen resources for entrepreneurs by improving the SCORE program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 115-322.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
SCORE for Small Business Act of 2017
This bill amends the Small Business Act to (1) reauthorize through FY2020 the Service Corps of Retired Executives program, (2) rename the program as the SCORE program, and (3) establish SCORE volunteer requirements.
